Conversations/Bank/Vera/Banked Lines/bef: You should ask some of the folk here what their hair was like before I started showing up.
Conversations/Bank/Vera/Banked Lines/cha: She sees everything that happens from behind that bar of hers, and I live to hear about it!
I love getting into it with Jo when I do her hair!
Conversations/Bank/Vera/Banked Lines/col: Let me take your mind off the cold with a great new cut!
Conversations/Bank/Vera/Banked Lines/com: Come by again some time, I'll give you an easy breezy cut!
Conversations/Bank/Vera/Banked Lines/coo: Glad Darcy's here, I'm just steps away from a cool drink!
Conversations/Bank/Vera/Banked Lines/day: Gotta catch up on all the gossip I missed while the bridge was out!
The day flies by when you're having fun! I'm so happy to be cutting hair in Mistria again.
Conversations/Bank/Vera/Banked Lines/eil: Eiland's hair would be the perfect canvas for some wild colors! Imagine him rocking neon green!
Conversations/Bank/Vera/Banked Lines/fav: Mistria is definitely one of my favorite stops on my route.
Conversations/Bank/Vera/Banked Lines/fre: It's so nice to be out in the fresh air cutting hair!
Everyone's hair is different, but I love a fresh challenge.
I was so busy today! Everyone wanted their fresh spring cuts.
Conversations/Bank/Vera/Banked Lines/gos: You know everyone gossips with me, and some of the stories they tell about you, well... if half of them are true, I'm impressed!
Conversations/Bank/Vera/Banked Lines/gre: Great fashion starts with great hair!
The name's Vera. I'm a traveling hair stylist, I've been all over Aldaria!
I'd be happy to teach you any hairstyle I know, just pick what you want and put down your coins!
Hello! If you're looking for a new hairstyle, you're talking to the right person!
Conversations/Bank/Vera/Banked Lines/hot: Have some hot new looks today, be sure to check them out!
Conversations/Bank/Vera/Banked Lines/jun: She'd look killer as a blonde!
What do you think are the chances that Juniper lets me do something wild with her hair next time?
Conversations/Bank/Vera/Banked Lines/mar: I'll sound him out next time he needs a touch up!
I love dying March's hair, but do you think he'll ever want something other than red?
Conversations/Bank/Vera/Banked Lines/mor: Here for a trim, [Ari]? Or something a little more exciting?
Conversations/Bank/Vera/Banked Lines/new: A new year calls for a new hairstyle!
Conversations/Bank/Vera/Banked Lines/nex: I'm always getting new hair styles in. If you don't see something this week, be sure to stop by next time!
Conversations/Bank/Vera/Banked Lines/off: If you're looking to do something with long hair, a braid or a bun can help keep it off your neck.
Conversations/Bank/Vera/Banked Lines/pac: Another day, another fluffy pile of hair to tidy up!
See you next time, [Ari]! You better believe I'll have some eye-catching styles for you.
Conversations/Bank/Vera/Banked Lines/sac: What a day! Do you think Merri will let me sack out on one of her carpets?
Conversations/Bank/Vera/Banked Lines/scr: I've got a hairstyle that just screams "[Ari]" today!
Conversations/Bank/Vera/Banked Lines/som: Have you ever thought about dyeing your hair a new color? Sky's the limit!
Conversations/Bank/Vera/Banked Lines/spr: Spring calls for fresh starts, and I'm always happy to help everyone look their best!
Another Saturday Market in the bag.
Conversations/Bank/Vera/Banked Lines/str: Talk about bringing your work home with you!
You wouldn't believe the places you find stray hair when you're a stylist.
Conversations/Bank/Vera/Banked Lines/sum: Why not take the edge off that summer heat with a fresh hairstyle?
Another day of seeing my favorite customers! And getting the gossip, of course.
Weather was warm today, wasn't it? I must've had four of those iced teas from Darcy's!
Conversations/Bank/Vera/Banked Lines/tim: The day's over! Heck, the year's almost over! Time flies, doesn't it?
Conversations/Bank/Vera/Banked Lines/tri: And Dell had to go and inherit it!
I got to trim Holt's hair today. He's always had that cowlick, you know.
Conversations/Bank/Vera/Banked Lines/va_: It takes a special hand to keep Elsie's hair the way she likes it! She likes that va-va-voom, if you know what I mean.
Conversations/Bank/Vera/Banked Lines/wai: Don't wait till spring to get your hair done!
Conversations/Bank/Vera/Gift Lines/gift_: Ooh, I bet I know what this is!
Ugh this is so slimy, it throws off my whole vibe! Shellfish belong in the river!
=Coconut Milk= is so versatile! I could have a fancy drink... or maybe I'll make a hair mask!
Ooh thank you! I can't resist a tart drink! The best =Cranberry Juice= makes your whole jaw tingle.
I'm not saying I hate it, but I'm not saying I like it either...
[Ari] how did you know? =Gazpacho= is the perfect meal! What's better than a smoothie... but savory?
How'd you know I like this? Thanks, [Ari]!
Ooh, for me? Don't mind if I do! Thanks for looking out, [Ari].
[Ari], you nailed it! I really needed a pick-me-up!
You're so sweet, thinking of me! This is just what I needed!
Thanks [Ari]! You wouldn't believe how much energy it takes to cut hair all day!
Aw, thanks for thinking of me.
A fresh =Orange Juice= was exactly what I needed! You're a sweetie, [Ari].
What a beautiful =Pomegranate=! You know, the nutrients in these are really good for your hair and skin.
What a gorgeous =Summer Salad=! So refreshing! Just the thing for a day on my feet!
